operation.name: Select
operation.sql: SELECT id, bot_id, bot_type, creator_user_id, token, description, bot_chat_history, bot_nochats, bot_inline_geo, bot_info_version, bot_inline_placeholder FROM bots WHERE bot_id = :bot_id

operation.name: SelectByToken
operation.sql: SELECT bot_id FROM bots WHERE token = :token

operation.name: SelectByIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id, bot_id, bot_type, creator_user_id, token, description, bot_chat_history, bot_nochats, bot_inline_geo, bot_info_version, bot_inline_placeholder FROM bots WHERE bot_id IN (:id_list)
